data.name: V Rising Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
V Rising Original Soundtrack by Aleksandria Migova

  • Original tracks, available in both Wav 24bit 48khz and Mp3 320kbps
  • Soundtrack Cover Artwork

*This Soundtrack can only be purchased by buying the Founder's Pack: Eldest Bloodline DLC
